website_summaries.verdict: While you will need Windows 10 to use it, this inexpensive scanner is easy to use and takes up little space.
pros: Wide screen for improved scanning reliability
Offers anti-spoofing and supports file and folder encryption
cons: Some buyers report that the scanner works poorly or not at all with their fingerprints

customer_reviews.title: 4 months later, no longer reading fingerprint.
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for 4 months, but as of late it is not reading my fingerprint anymore. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the device a few times, but today that trick no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: About one year ago, I purchased two devices, one for my laptop and one for my PC. Both run Windows 10 with finger print login. They work very well. Recently, one of the devices malfunctioned - it simply quit working. I contacted the manufacturer and, since it was within the one year warranty, a new one was shipped to me without any hassle. Solid purchase from a solid company!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a laptop that doesn't have a fingerprint scanner. It works quicker and easier than the fingerprint scanner on my previous laptop. I rarely have to scan my finger more than once. Windows 10 has built in drivers and I didn't have to go through any special setup to use it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two devices and initially they worked very well, much faster than a previous USB fingerprint reader I owned. However, both devices that I purchased stopped functioning after approximately 5-6 months. After contacting IDEM support through their website, I received a prompt and through assistance. Solo Cheng from IDEM tried troubleshooting and after all steps failed, he provided replacement devices. The replacement devices work as advertised. I truly appreciated their warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I got a lemon. Doesnt work at all for me.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me the device never worked. Its not recognized by the pc. Its as if the reader was dead since it never even tried to install drivers or pop up anything. Windows hello set up also doesn't show any sort of fingerprint reader detected. Its a shame because I was really looking forward for this device to protect my files.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Small, secure and fast
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It made my sign-ins on my laptop much faster. So, I went ahead and bought another one for my Surface Pro 7. Just plug it in, and it will be ready to use right away. No configuration (except Windows Hello setup) necessary. They have lasted for the last 10 months and seem like they will for a long time. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: pagade

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. I tried programming this four times. After each programming session, it was supposed to recognize my fingerprint. I put the computer to sleep, tried to wake it with my fingerprint, and it would not recognize it. I tried adding additional fingerprints, many times, and the same results. I am now back to using a pin. It was a nice idea, but it did not work. My wife threw out the packaging so I can not even return it.
customer_reviews.author: jay f jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Works with INTEL based, not with AMD
customer_reviews.text: Tried with Intel and AMD based laptops desktops thin client mini pcs. It works well with all INTEL based systems. It does NOT work with all AMD based systems. Emailed the company for the issue, no response at all.
customer_reviews.author: SNOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it is Microsoft's issue or the device, but the bottom line is - It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up and seemed working pretty good. But quickly you would find it stopped working, had to unplug it and plug it in again for it to work again. A Windows upgrade erased all settings, set it again, worked again, but soon same issue came back, had to unplug it and plug it in again for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Woodbill

customer_reviews.title: Works about 70% of the time
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's okay for its price. It works about 70% of the time, which is on par with some of the lame integrated fingerprint readers found in some Lenovo laptops, but below average of the modern fingerprint readers you can find on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: works great , must have for teens laptops
customer_reviews.text: have it installed on a lenovo flex , have multiple fingerprints registered and works as expected. LIke the low profile , never need to remove
customer_reviews.author: Shahid

customer_reviews.title: It works!! Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: this thing works soo fast....i'll admit I had to setup my fingerprint twice before it would recognize my finger first attempt, but I didn't mind, especially because of how cheap this is. I didn't try out the optional software for encrypting and logging into websites because i was just interested in logging into windows easier. Get it and you wont regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Elrick Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Review of BioScan fingerprint scanner: 1. Fast and convenient - no need to recall your password, and no more typo. 2. Secure - sign in without hesitation when someone is looking over your shoulders. Overall a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ching Yuan Wang

customer_reviews.title: Super value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Plug and play and works as it should! Rock-solid performance on Windows even with slightly wet fingerprints or under different angles of touch! Recommend if you are on Windows 10!!! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 likes this device and so do I
customer_reviews.text: Odd that my new HP Omen X $3200 laptop needed an upgrade at all, but it did not include a fingerprint reader. This one is spot on, and I actually prefer it to my old one that was built into my old HP Envy laptop. Works perfectly 100% of the time. No drivers needed at all. Windows 10 likes this device and so do I. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Fast, MultiFinger print , and integrate with Windows Authentication Bootstart
customer_reviews.text: So far its working great and easy to install. Added fingerprint authentication to my Windows 10 bootstart, this one is built in with the Windows OS which was easy. Installed the included app from their website which was very useful. I was able to save all my passwords in Chrome. Also able to encrypt files and folder with fingerprint. Also I was able to save 10 finger prints which is good. Pros: small and compact fast accurate Multi fingerprint WIndows authentication integration
customer_reviews.author: J. Teng

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and works as described. On time delivery and would buy from them again because it was a good value too.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Fast and reliable used with Windows Hello
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great with Windows Hello login
customer_reviews.author: Scott (Technogeek)Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by how fast it logs me in
customer_reviews.author: clyde

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel, high tech. Hehe!
customer_reviews.text: Neat little gadget, that makes it easy to sign in. Thought it was a tad over priced, but ease of use makes it worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, works most every time with one touch ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Bio Scanner I have purchased other than built in models. I love it, works most every time with one touch and a rapid response.
customer_reviews.author: John J Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Really worthless product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Takes a lot of images of your fingerprints to set up, so why it has a 10% success rate of working on three attempt? Save your money, spend a few more dollars and get a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Craig N.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works for me, using win 10, unlocks the computer instantly , beats typing in a pw
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded my computer with fingerprint reading
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, accurate fingerprint reading, very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easier than typing the 14 character requirement at work now.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, can’t live without it now!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, set up, and use. Any family member with a fingerprint registered can sign in to my Windows 10 laptop quickly with a touch of a finger. I am on the hook since day 1 - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wkw27

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up on Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. Super easy to set up on Windows 10. Perfect size and fast response
customer_reviews.author: david hsu

customer_reviews.title: Works but not reliably for me.
customer_reviews.text: Integrates well into Windows. Does not work reliably enough to be useful. It's faster for me to use a pin code to unlock computer.
customer_reviews.author: Urs Utzinger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nifty
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly how you'd expect. Just make sure your hand isnt wet or sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Windows 10 automatically downloads driver them set up through Windows Hello :)
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Right size. Easy to install. Immediately recognition, lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Works great without the need to install any additional software on Windows 10 laptop. You have to make sure you train Windows 10 correctly by positioning your finger in all the different angles during the setup phase. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT DID NOT WORK WITH WIN 10
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE PRODUCT DID NOT WORK WITH WIN 10 AS THEY CLAIMED IN THERE ADVERTISEMENT ALSO THEIR WEBSITE IS UNSAFE TO GO INTO.
customer_reviews.author: 1MRDAVE

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It’s totally plug and play on Windows 10. And it works nearly identically to the newest iPhone fingerprint sensor. Very convenient. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

product_meta.title: Idem FCC BioScan Compact USB Fingerprint Scanner for Fast Win10 Sign-in w/Wide Sensor for Superb 1st Attempt Recognition, Anti-spoofing Protection, 360°Finger Readability, Multi Fingerprints Support
product_meta.description:
Idem FCC Certified BioScan Compact USB Fingerprint Scanner 
Designed for Windows 10, Hello ONLY. 
14mm wide sensor for higher 1st attempt success rate. 
Anti-Spoofing, secure biometrics protection. 
360° finger readability. 
Multi Fingerprint (up to 10 fingers per user account). 
File/Folder Encryption (with optional software) 
1-Touch Web Login (with optional software). 

Warranty 
This product is covered by a warranty for a period of one(1) year from the date of original purchase. For more information, please visit our product website. 

Help: 
For more information and support on this product,please visit our product website.
feature_bullets: 14mm wide fingerprint sensor touch pad for highest 1st attempt success rate and 360° readability for convenient fingerprint scanning from multiple angles.
Anti-spoofing, secure biometrics protection, and register up to 10 fingers per user account.
Support file/folder encryption and one touch web login (with optional software).
Fast Windows operating system sign-in within 0.25 seconds and WINDOWS 10 ONLY – NO SUPPORT FOR LINUX, MAC or WINDOWS 10 ENTERPRISE VERSION.
FCC certified, a breeze to install and use with intuitive, quick start guide, US local customer support, plus 1-year warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
